dict.acceptation: 物体；目标；宾语；客体，对象；

sent.orig: STT_OBJECT: The symbol is associated with a data object, such as a variable, an array, etc.
sent.trans: OBJECT表示该符号和一个数据对象相关，比如一个变量、一个数组等。

sent.orig: Determines if the specified Object is assignment compatible with the object represented by this Class.
sent.trans: 确定指定的Object是否可赋值给该Class表示的对象。

sent.orig: Wrap general-purpose classes that operate on java.lang.Object to provide static type checking.
sent.trans: 对操作对象为java.lang.Object的通用类进行包装，以提供静态类型检查。

sent.orig: The Collection is assigned to a Command object, Connection object, Field object, or a Recordset object.
sent.trans: 上述的属性集合将被指派到一个指令对象、连接对象、字段对象或是一个记录集对象中。

sent.orig: An object that is not a sub-object of any other object is called a complete object.
sent.trans: 不是任何其他对象的子对象的对象被称为完整对象。
